A "to be extended" list of interesting HTML5 resources and info. Web Forms 2.0 are covered too since they are deprecated meanwhile but still of relevance in browsers like Opera 10+

= Resources on HTML5 =

  * [http://dev.w3.org/html5/spec/Overview.html HTML5 W3C Spec Overview]
  * [http://simon.html5.org/html5-elements HTML5 Elements and Attributes]
  * [http://dev.w3.org/html5/html4-differences/ HTML5 differences from HTML4]
  * [http://html5.org/tools/web-apps-tracker HTML5 Revision Tracker]
  * [http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-forms/current-work/ Web Forms 2.0]
